page.title: 03ATTITUDES/CONCERNS DEFYNNOG
page.content: On the return of questionaires the following concerns were stressed. { HOUSING Council repairs mean tennants may have to be temporarily rehoused as far away as Brecon. Large protest seems to have changed this policy. { LIBRARY SERVICE Outcry that the part time library is going to close. Mobile library thought to be unsuitable for the area. Plea to the B.B.C. through this survey. { PUBLIC SERVICES There is much insecurity concerning cuts in public services. { EDUCATION Concern about cuts in the education budget. (No mention of strikes!!!) { LIFE STYLES Call for wholefood availability in the locality. No shops stock larger items - must travel to Brecon or further.
